item.description:
Howdy All,

Join us Saturday March 16th for our St. Patricks Day Party !! Wear green, get creative !! Walkin the Line takes the stage at 9:00

Win a pair of tickets to see Country Artist Jerrod Niemann (March 17th show at the Colonial Theatre in Keene, NH)For more info about the show: http://thecolonial.org/jerrodniemann.html

March 23rd: Beyond Basic two-step(must know basic two-step)

Where: Midnight Rodeo BarTime: 4:00 - 6:00Cost: $10 (per person)Limited space ! MUST PRE-Register !(registration forms attached)

EVERY SATURDAY NIGHT:

Doors open at 7:00

Line dance lessons 7:30 - 8:30

Band 9:00 - 12:30

Ask about our private VIP party area !

See you at Midnight......................Rodeo Bar

www.midnightrodeobar.com

603-703-8444
item.name: Live Country Music and Dancing
